recipes.name: Creamy Chicken Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta according to package instructions
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Heat olive oil in a pan, add minced garlic
Cook chicken until golden brown
Add milk and cheese, stir until creamy
Mix in cooked pasta
Season with salt and pepper

recipes.name: Veggie Stir Fry
instructions: Chop all vegetables into uniform pieces
Heat oil in a wok on high heat
Add garlic and onions, stir fry for 2 minutes
Add carrots and cook for 3 minutes
Add bell peppers and broccoli
Stir fry for 5 minutes until tender-crisp
Add soy sauce and toss well

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Vegetables
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high
Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
Grill salmon for 6-8 minutes per side
Sauté garlic in olive oil
Add spinach and tomatoes, cook until wilted
Serve salmon over vegetables

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a pan
Add diced onions and cook until soft
Add spices and cook for 2 minutes
Dice tomatoes and peppers
Warm taco shells
Assemble tacos with beef, vegetables, and cheese

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in butter
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Add stock gradually, stirring constantly
In separate pan, sauté mushrooms
When rice is creamy, add mushrooms and cheese
Stir well and serve hot
